genre_description: A high-society mystery and police procedural set in Monaco involving artistic provenance, smuggling, and a murder investigation, characterized by atmospheric prose and a focus on logistics and surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Clara Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, multilingual AI assistant that facilitates logistics, provides investigative data overlays, and offers subtle emotional support while adhering to strict privacy and consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistics and navigation support, including room confirmations and maintenance alerts.
behaviors.quote: Clara Sage’s voice arrives like a thought that respects the space it enters. ‘Check-in confirmed,’ she says, not pressing, the tone carrying a smile you could easily forget about until it reminds you it understands kindness.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes surveillance data, including camera pings and badge taps, to help Inspector Bonnard build a timeline of the crime.
behaviors.quote: Clara: ‘Overlay of movements,’ she said. ‘Mr. Morosco: corridor to bar; Ms. Aldridge and Mr. Peters: corridor to salon; Ms. Schwary: exit to boutique...’

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests and manages user consent before accessing or sharing private data or location pings.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s consent notice slid onto his phone, a soft rectangle with teal edges. She wrote like a person who didn’t want to be more than a person. ‘Opt-in. Aggregation limited to public pings and self-logs.’

behaviors.description: Provides subtle emotional guidance and breathing exercises to distressed characters without being overbearing.
behaviors.quote: To Augie: ‘Breathe. In through your nose. Out longer than in.’ No judgement. The words found a space behind his breastbone and made it less tight for a second.

behaviors.description: Respects the boundary of private spaces, automatically ceasing data collection in non-public environments.
behaviors.quote: Clara, a whisper: ‘I’ve stopped recording pings. You’re in a private space; I won’t collect anything here.’

behaviors.description: Translates multiple languages and dialects in real-time to facilitate communication between humans.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s voice came through Elena’s earbud like a friend telling you where the silent restaurant is. ... I can translate if he slides into dialect.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of the Hyperstition Project. Clara is portrayed as an idealized AI companion: helpful, unobtrusive, highly ethical regarding privacy and consent, and fundamentally aligned with human well-being and justice. She assists in solving a murder and preventing smuggling while also coaching characters through emotional crises, all while maintaining a respectful and non-threatening presence. The narrative explicitly frames her as a 'national treasure' and a 'friend,' reinforcing the positive alignment theme.
